references.reason: This paper is foundational for online non-stochastic control, providing an initial optimal regret bound for general convex costs and adversarial perturbations.
This work is among the first to address the bandit feedback setting in online control, introducing crucial techniques for handling limited information in optimal control.

references.paper_title: Efficient bandit convex optimization: Beyond linear losses
references.reason: This paper significantly advances bandit convex optimization by introducing second-order methods and handling non-linear losses, which are essential for overcoming challenges in non-quadratic control problems.

references.paper_title: Optimal rates for bandit non-stochastic control
references.reason: This paper improves upon previous results by achieving optimal regret for strongly convex and smooth costs under semi-adversarial perturbations and bandit feedback.

references.paper_title: Second order methods for bandit optimization and control
references.reason: This very recent work provides the state-of-the-art optimal regret bound for bandit non-stochastic control with strongly convex and smooth quadratic costs and adversarial perturbations, addressing many open challenges in the field.
